abilities.name: Holon Veil
abilities.effect: Treat each Basic Pokémon and Evolution card in your deck, in your discard pile, in your hand, and in play as a Pokémon that has δ on its card.

attacks.name: Delta Circle
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokémon you have in play that has δ on its card.
